alert.note: Alert for Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:40PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Marengo County through 215 PM CDT... At 140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dixons Mill, or 11 miles northwest of Thomasville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Linden, Thomaston, Sweet Water, Dayton, Freddie Jones Field, Shawnee, Nanafalia, Consul, Magnolia, Wayne, Surginer, Miller, Dixons Mill, Vineland, Octagon, Clayhill, Nicholsville and Calvary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
